summary: An email from Marc A. Weinstein to Andrew Tomback regarding an update on Jeffrey Epstein's New York property, sent in July 2020. The email is a request for a call to discuss the property, indicating ongoing legal or administrative matters related to Epstein's estate.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Partner, Chair of White Collar Defense at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP

keyFacts: The email is dated July 16, 2020, indicating ongoing legal or administrative activity related to Jeffrey Epstein's estate over a year after his death.
Marc A. Weinstein, a white-collar defense partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP, is involved in matters concerning Epstein's New York property.
